text:
Greetings,

I'm writing this email with a heavy heart. On July 20th, 2024, my wife and
I visited the Sunway Carnival Mall in Butterworth and headed to Zus Coffee
to order our usual beverages. However, the experience we had was far from
satisfactory.

As we approached the counter to place our order, the staff member at the
cashier (whose name I'm afraid I didn't catch) informed us that they were
unable to take our order due to a high volume of orders. This same message
was conveyed to the customer who was in line behind us as well.

Despite my polite request to wait and collect the coffee once it was ready,
the staff member insisted that it would take an hour to fulfill our order.
This was especially concerning as the area around the counter appeared to
have no visible crowd or long lines.

I'm truly disappointed by the way this situation was handled by the staff
member. It's a great concern to me that an unqualified individual was
manning the front line, which can significantly impact the Zus brand's
reputation. I strongly believe that your front-line staff require proper
training on customer service and order management to ensure a seamless and
positive experience for all your patrons.

I would greatly appreciate a response from you regarding this matter. If I
do not receive a satisfactory explanation or resolution, I may feel
compelled to share my experience on social media platforms.

I eagerly await your eagerly.

Rgds/Resh


Hi SHABARESH BASKARAN,  Thank you for your prompt response and providing us with the details.     We appreciate you for bringing this matter to our attention. We take this issue very seriously and are currently in the midst of investigating it thoroughly. Please rest assured that we are committed to improving our staff service at ZUS Coffee outlets to ensure a better experience for our valued customers in the future.     Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we appreciate your patience as we work towards making the necessary improvements. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you encounter any issues or concerns. We are here to assist you in the best way we can.   We hope you have a good week ahead!   Warmest Regards,     Mohd Afdhal Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
Good Day Mohd Afdhal

The incident took place between  6.30 to 7.15 pm as I can't really recall
the exact time.

As I was talking to few of my close friends on the incidents are also in
same opinion as me as the customer service needs a major revamp.....

Hope your team will look into it.

Brgds/Shabaresh


Hi SHABARESH BASKARAN,  Greetings from ZUS Coffee.     We understand how unpleasant this experience must have been for you and we would like to apologize for this. This shouldn’t have happened to you or any of our customers. We really regret not being able to meet your expectations this time.      We are putting the highest priority on this issue and will forward it to the relevant team to check and take necessary action to prevent this from happening again.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your unpleasant experience. Your feedback will help us improve our business and help us grow.   May we check if you remember estimate time during your visit to the ZUS Coffee Sunway Carnival Mall outlet? As this information will help us to further investigate on this case. Once again, we truly apologize for the inconvenience caused by the staff from the ZUS Coffee Sunway Carnival Mall outlet.     We hope to hear from you soon.      Warmest Regards,     Mohd Afdhal Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Inability to place an order due to staff's refusal during a low-traffic time  
Identified Problem: Staff member's poor customer service and order management skills  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of proper training for front-line staff  
- Miscommunication regarding order fulfillment times despite low customer volume  
Resolution Offered: Investigation into the incident and commitment to improve staff training and service  
Overall Summary: The customer, Shabaresh, expressed disappointment over an experience at Zus Coffee where staff refused to take their order due to a claimed high volume of orders, despite the area being relatively empty. The customer highlighted concerns about the staff's qualifications and the need for better training in customer service. The company acknowledged the issue, apologized, and committed to investigating and improving staff training to prevent future occurrences.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated

Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the delivery address and the rider's inappropriate conduct  
Contributing Factors:  
- The rider's inability to locate the customer's condo, leading to frustration and aggressive behavior  
- The customer’s immediate response to the rider's calls, which was not acknowledged by the rider, resulting in further escalation of the situation

Despite the customer responding promptly, the rider's behavior escalated to a point where the customer felt threatened. The agent acknowledged the issue, offered a complimentary drink voucher, and assured the customer that the matter would be investigated. The root cause appears to be a combination of miscommunication regarding the delivery address and the rider's inappropriate conduct.

Primary Concern: Lack of updates on order status through the app  
Identified Problem: Ineffective communication regarding order readiness  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of real-time updates in the app  
- Unpleasant customer service experience at the store  
Resolution Offered: Apology and assurance that feedback will be relayed to improve service  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving updates on their order status through the app, leading to the need to check in-store. They also reported an unpleasant experience with staff attitude. The agent acknowledged the issue, apologized, and promised to relay the feedback for service improvement, but no immediate resolution was provided for the app's functionality. The root cause appears to be a combination of ineffective app communication and inadequate customer service at the store.

Identified Problem: Poor packaging or handling of drinks leading to leaks  
Contributing Factors:  
- Inadequate sealing or quality control of the cups  
- Possible mishandling during delivery

The agent acknowledged the problem and offered a refund for the affected drinks, citing rider availability as a reason for not providing replacements. The root cause appears to be related to the packaging or handling of the drinks, leading to leaks during transit. The customer expressed frustration but ultimately received a satisfactory resolution with the refund.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing straws from a pickup order  
Identified Problem: The straws were not included in the customer's order at the time of pickup.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The order was designated as a pickup, which limited the ability to deliver the missing items.  
- Lack of proper packing procedures at the outlet, leading to the omission of straws in the order.  
Resolution Offered: A complimentary drink voucher was provided as an apology for the inconvenience.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving straws with their coffee order, which was a pickup. The agent explained that since it was a pickup order, they could not deliver the missing straws and suggested arranging a pickup. The customer was dissatisfied with this response, feeling that the straws should have been included in the order. As a resolution, the agent offered a complimentary drink voucher as an apology. The root cause of the issue appears to be a failure in the packing process at the outlet.

The root cause appears to be a combination of communication lapses and operational challenges at the outlet, particularly related to driver availability for delivery.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: The customer did not receive their order despite it being marked as delivered.  
Identified Problem: The order was recorded as delivered, but the rider returned it to the outlet without successfully delivering it to the customer.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication between the rider and the customer regarding the delivery status.  
- The customer did not receive any missed calls or notifications from the rider, which may indicate a failure in communication or delivery protocol.  
Resolution Offered: A recovery order was arranged to be delivered to the customer, along with a new order number for tracking.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was marked as delivered. After confirming with the rider, it was revealed that the order was returned to the outlet. The agent facilitated a recovery order to resolve the issue, and the customer was ultimately satisfied with the solution provided. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication regarding the delivery status and a lack of notification to the customer.

The agent committed to reporting the delivery issue for future improvement.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery and incorrect order status  
Identified Problem: The order was not prepared due to the absence of a rider to pick it up.  
Contributing Factors:  
- System error in rider assignment or availability  
- Miscommunication regarding order status and preparation  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that if a rider could not be found within 30 minutes, the system would automatically refund the order. Additionally, the agent provided the contact details of the rider once they were assigned.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delay in receiving their order, which was compounded by an incorrect order status indicating it was being prepared. The root cause appears to be a system issue related to rider availability, leading to miscommunication about the order's status. The agent provided information about the refund process and the rider's contact details as a resolution.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer did not receive their order and is requesting a refund.  
Identified Problem: Incorrect delivery address and lack of communication from the delivery rider.

- Incorrect address provided in the order (user's address was misentered).  
- Rider did not call the customer to confirm the delivery or address, leading to confusion.

Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order and the rider's failure to call for confirmation. The main issue stemmed from an incorrect address entry and a lack of communication from the delivery rider. The agent ultimately offered a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance as a resolution.

- Incorrect items delivered, specifically all drinks were wrong

The root cause appears to be a miscommunication or error during the order fulfillment or delivery process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order marked as delivered but not received  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding delivery status and rider's inability to deliver due to lack of response  
Contributing Factors:  
- The rider returned the order due to no response during delivery attempts.  
- The app incorrectly indicated that the order was delivered.  
- One item from the order was out of stock, leading to confusion and dissatisfaction.  
Resolution Offered: Refund issued to the customer's ZUS balance; option to place a new order.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over an order that was marked as delivered but was never received. The issue stemmed from a miscommunication where the rider returned the order due to no response, despite the app indicating delivery. Additionally, one item was out of stock, complicating the situation further. The agent offered a refund to the customer's ZUS balance, allowing them to place a new order.

The customer expressed frustration but rated the service positively at the end of the interaction.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Incorrect order and request for a refund  
Identified Problem: Customer mistakenly ordered from the wrong outlet and did not pick up the order.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the order status and inability to cancel or amend the order after it was prepared.  
- Language barrier and confusion in the initial interactions, leading to delays in addressing the customer's issue.  
Resolution Offered: Refund processed back to the original payment method, with a notification that it may take 14 working days to reflect.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially faced issues with an incorrect order due to selecting the wrong outlet and was frustrated by the inability to communicate this effectively. After several attempts to clarify the issue, the agent eventually processed a refund back to the customer's payment method. The root cause of the issue stemmed from miscommunication and the system's inability to accommodate changes once the order was prepared.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order was incorrectly marked as "pick up" instead of "delivery"  
Identified Problem: System error or miscommunication regarding order type  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer expected delivery but received a pick-up option  
- Lack of clarity in the ordering process or system settings

The agent confirmed that once an order is placed, it cannot be modified. The customer was offered a refund to their ZUS Balance, which they accepted. The interaction ended positively, with the customer indicating they would order again in the future. The root cause appears to be a system error or miscommunication regarding the order type.

The agent facilitated a refund for the missing order and assisted with refunding the customer's ZUS balance to their credit card, addressing the customer's concerns effectively.

agent: The ZUS Coffee Referral Program is a program that rewards existing ZUS App users for referring their friends to the app.

When a friend signs up using a referral code and makes their first in-app purchase, both the referrer and the friend receive reward vouchers.

You can earn discount vouchers based on your member level and the number of successful referrals you have.

The higher your member level and the more successful referrals you make, the better discount vouchers you can receive.

When your friends sign up with your referral code, they will have to make their first in-app purchase to be entitled to the ZUS app referee journey.

Here are the vouchers that your friend can unlock progressively:
1. 60% OFF Top Picks
2. Buy 1 and get 50% OFF
3. Ultimate voucher pack

Identified Problem: The customer is unable to receive the OTP due to issues with their registered phone number, which has expired.

- Miscommunication regarding the ability to log in using an email address instead of a phone number.

Overall Summary: The customer initially faced issues receiving an OTP code necessary for logging into the ZUS Coffee app, primarily due to an expired registered phone number. Despite multiple attempts to resolve the issue, the customer encountered repeated invalid number errors and miscommunication about login options. The agent eventually provided the OTP after acknowledging the technical issue, but the interaction highlighted the need for clearer communication regarding account recovery options and the importance of keeping contact information updated.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer did not receive their order despite it showing as delivered in the app.  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the order status and delivery, compounded by the driver's rude behavior.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The driver claimed the order was canceled, which contradicted the app's status showing it as delivered.  
- The driver did not call the customer as stated, leading to further confusion.  
- The customer's experience was negatively impacted by the driver's demeanor.  
Resolution Offered: A refund was processed to the customer's ZUS wallet, and the issue was escalated for further investigation regarding the driver's conduct.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was marked as delivered in the app. Miscommunication from the driver, who claimed the order was canceled and did not contact the customer, contributed to the issue. The customer also reported the driver's rude behavior. A refund was issued to the customer's ZUS wallet, and the matter was escalated for further action regarding the driver's conduct.

Ultimately, the customer was able to log in and was informed about the withdrawal process for their balance, but the root cause of the issue stemmed from the inability to receive OTPs on the old number.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Extended waiting period for order preparation  
Identified Problem: Lack of clear communication regarding order wait times and cancellation options  
Contributing Factors:  
- Insufficient staffing leading to delays in order preparation  
- No visible estimated wait time provided at the time of order placement  
Resolution Offered: Refund processed to the customer's ZUS balance  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over an extended waiting period for their order, which they wished to cancel. They highlighted the lack of information regarding wait times and the absence of a cancellation option in the app. The agent acknowledged the issue, attributed it to staffing shortages, and processed a refund to the customer's ZUS balance. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of inadequate communication about wait times and operational inefficiencies.

The interaction highlighted issues with order fulfillment and communication, leading to customer frustration, but ultimately resulted in a resolution.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay and lack of service at the pickup window  
Identified Problem: Non-functioning bell at the pickup window and inattentive staff  
Contributing Factors:  
- Staff distraction and lack of awareness while on duty  
- Malfunctioning equipment (pickup window bell)  
Resolution Offered: Assurance that the issue will be escalated, CCTV will be reviewed, and necessary actions will be taken to improve service  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over waiting 15 minutes at the pickup window without any crew attending to them, compounded by a non-functioning bell. Upon entering, the customer observed staff engaged in conversation and not paying attention. The agent acknowledged the issue, apologized, and assured the customer that the matter would be escalated for review and improvement. The customer requested that the crew be reminded to take their work seriously, emphasizing the need for service enhancement rather than punitive measures.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing Velvet Crème from the order  
Identified Problem: The Velvet Crème was not included in the order, and the customer felt it was not present in the drink received.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the missing item and the agent's inability to understand the customer's initial requests.  
- Possible product quality issue where the Velvet Crème may have dissipated during delivery, leading to the customer not experiencing its essence.  
Resolution Offered: A refund of RM2 to the customer's ZUS balance was proposed and implemented.  
Overall Summary: The customer reported a missing Velvet Crème from their order, expressing frustration over the lack of clarity in communication with the agent. The agent acknowledged the issue and offered a refund while also indicating that they would investigate the matter further. The interaction highlighted a potential product quality issue and miscommunication as the root causes of the customer's concern. The customer ultimately accepted the resolution and ended the chat on a positive note.

user: Your staff being so rude for three times 👎🏻 At first, di cashier dia langsung tak senyum dan tak menyapa selamat datang “welcome”. Okay itu saya boleh tolerate dan sabar lagi. Second, when my number is up then i went to pickup counter. Saya memang taktahu mana satu saya punya order atau bungkusan. Then i asked which one ? She just simply show my order dengan muncung mulut. Are your staff too lazy to speak ? Setelah ambil order dan pergi ke kereta, saya tergerak hati nak check my order. And bam wrong order. I ordered for pearl sugar waffle, i get some kind of chocolate bread instead. So saya pergi balik pada Zus dan minta tukar. She so “kindly” took that and reheat pearl sugar waffle. Dan dia bagi saya order tu without saying SORRY ! I repeat without saying SORRY ! What the f**k is that kind of behaviour? It’s her mistake, so why should her get mad ? You can check the cctv at Zus Coffee Kota Masai, time 18:58 - 19:30 (maybe) ikutkan hati ni, memang nak maki dan malu kan dia depan public. Tapi saya fikir air muka dia. So that’s being rude for three times. And for now, Zus Coffee out of my favourite list. Sayonara ! summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing Chicken Slice & Cheese Croissant from the order  
Identified Problem: Discrepancy between the customer's claim of missing food and the outlet's confirmation of the item being packed and delivered.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of tracking or verification of the food items during delivery, leading to uncertainty about the order's integrity.  
- Reliance on CCTV footage as the sole evidence of delivery completion, which the customer disputes.  
Resolution Offered: Refund of RM10.90 through ZUS Balance, with a request for the customer to allow 7 working days for the refund to reflect.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a missing Chicken Slice & Cheese Croissant from their order, despite the outlet confirming it was packed and delivered. The agent relied on CCTV footage to support the outlet's claim, which the customer found unsatisfactory, leading to a heated exchange. Ultimately, the agent offered a partial refund, but the customer requested a refund to their original payment method instead. The interaction highlighted a significant gap in delivery verification processes, contributing to the customer's dissatisfaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: App issue leading to payment deduction without account reload  
Identified Problem: System error causing payment processing issues and account reload failure  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the app issue and payment status  
- Potential technical glitches in the app affecting account updates  
Resolution Offered: Account refresh and assurance that the relevant team is addressing the issue  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced an issue with the mobile app where their account was deducted but not reloaded. The agent acknowledged the problem, apologized for the inconvenience, and indicated that the relevant team was working on a solution. The root cause appears to be a system error affecting payment processing and account updates, leading to customer frustration.

text:
Dear Tan,     Greetings from ZUS Coffee!     We understand how unpleasant this experience must have been for you and we would like to apologize for this. This shouldn’t have happened to you or any of our customers. We really regret not being able to meet your expectations this time.   We are putting the highest priority on this issue and will forward it to the relevant team to check and take necessary action to prevent this from happening again.    We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your unpleasant experience. Your feedback will help us improve our business and help us grow.    Warmest Regards,    Mohd Afdhal Customer Happiness Specialist     E. support@zuscoffee.com  W. www.zuscoffee.com
This ticket is closed and merged into ticket 444982
summary:
Customer sentiment: Displeased  
Primary Concern: Unpleasant experience with ZUS Coffee service  
Identified Problem: Failure to meet customer expectations  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of communication regarding service issues  
- Possible internal process or system errors leading to service failure  
Resolution Offered: Issue forwarded to the relevant team for investigation and action  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed dissatisfaction with their experience at ZUS Coffee, indicating that their expectations were not met. The root cause appears to be a combination of communication issues and potential internal errors. The company has acknowledged the complaint and is prioritizing the investigation to prevent future occurrences.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery and lack of updates  
Identified Problem: Order was marked as delivered, but the customer experienced a significant delay in receiving it  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of timely updates on order status  
- Delivery took longer than expected (over one hour for a 2km distance)  
Resolution Offered: Apology from the agent and assurance that the issue will be forwarded to the relevant team for further action  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delayed order delivery, which took over an hour for a short distance, and noted a lack of updates since the order was placed. The agent acknowledged the issue, apologized for the inconvenience, and assured the customer that the feedback would be used to improve future service. The root cause appears to be a combination of inadequate communication regarding order status and delays in the delivery process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Neutral  
Primary Concern: Customer wants to cancel an order due to selecting the wrong pickup location.  
Identified Problem: The order was already prepared for pickup, making cancellation or amendment impossible.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer mistakenly selected the wrong location for pickup.  
- The policy of the coffee chain regarding cancellations and amendments once an order is prepared.  
Resolution Offered: A 50% discount drink voucher for the next order was provided as compensation.  
Overall Summary: The customer contacted ZUS Coffee Malaysia to cancel an order due to selecting the wrong pickup location. The agent informed the customer that the order was already ready for pickup and could not be canceled or amended due to company policy. As a resolution, the agent offered a 50% discount voucher for the customer's next order. The interaction concluded with the customer accepting the voucher, and the agent expressed apologies for the inconvenience. The root cause of the issue was the customer's error in selecting the pickup location combined with the company's policy on order cancellations.

Primary Concern: Order not received  
Identified Problem: The order was returned to the outlet, leading to non-delivery.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the status of the order.  
- Lack of timely updates or notifications about the order's return.  
Resolution Offered: Replacement drink provided, along with a new order ID and rider number for tracking.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their coffee order (ID: 24072417965). The agent confirmed that the order had been returned to the outlet and offered a replacement drink. The customer was given a new order ID (24072424638) and a rider number for tracking. The root cause of the issue appears to be a miscommunication regarding the order's status and a lack of timely updates, which contributed to the customer's negative experience.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment charges on an order  
Identified Problem: A banking error leading to a double payment charge  
Contributing Factors:  
- System error or banking bug causing double payment  
- Lack of immediate resolution or follow-up process for the customer  
Resolution Offered: Refund processing initiated, with a timeline of up to 14 working days for completion  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced a double payment issue after placing an order, which was attributed to a banking error. The agent acknowledged the issue and initiated a refund process, informing the customer that it could take up to 14 working days. The customer expressed frustration over the double charge but was provided with a resolution path, including how to follow up if the refund was not received in the specified timeframe. The root cause appears to be a banking error rather than a failure in the service provided by the coffee chain.

The main issue stemmed from the system's inability to modify order types post-submission, compounded by the customer's current inability to leave the office. The agent suggested keeping the drink chilled until the customer could pick it up, but the interaction ended without a resolution to the customer's immediate need for delivery.
